pipeline_constant.description: Specify the constant gstreamer element of pipeline

device_serial_number.description: Serial number of the camera device

plugin_properties.description: Properties to be integrated in pipeline, The keys in here are mapped to respective gstreamer properties

ExposureAuto.description: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed

ExposureMode.description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure

ExposureTimeRaw.description: Sets the Exposure time (in us) when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off

Height.description: The height attribute can be used to crop/specify the height of the image(in pixels)

OffsetX.description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest(in pixels)

OffsetY.description: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest(in pixels)

PixelFormat.description: Format of the pixels provided by the device

Width.description: The width attribute can be used to crop/specify the width of the image
